review: It's really slick for the price, but there's limit to what you can pack into that little stick, I guess, because while it has basically the same features as its slightly larger competitors, it's noticeably slower to respond and the video quality. On the other hand it's half the price, which may make up for it for some folks. I'm definitely not unhappy with mine, but I don't know how I'd feel if it was the only streaming device I had in the house.
